synopsis.text: Oshii and Morimoto join forces with KENWOOD to deliver a captivating glimpse into a not-so-distant future, where AI-assistant earphones have become the norm. This short animation, serving as a promotional video for KENWOOD's 'WS-A1' and 'WS-A1G' wearable devices, presents an intriguing interpretation of life in a fictional city where technology has infiltrated every aspect of daily existence. Prepare to immerse yourself in a world that artfully blends reality with imagination, offering a thought-provoking exploration of our increasingly interconnected lives.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
